directions: Beat cream cheese, confectioners' sugar, and lemon juice together in a bowl with an electric mixer on low speed. Add whipped topping and beat until filling is well-combined. Spoon filling into graham cracker crust.
Stir strawberries and glaze together in a bowl until berries are coated; lay berries over pie filling. Refrigerate pie until chilled, at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese, softened
1 (8 ounce) container reduced-fat whipped topping, thawed
title: Strawberry Delight Pie
